content: व्यध् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (विध्यति, विद्ध) {@--1@} To pierce, hurt, strike, stab, kill; यूनां मनांसि विव्याध दृष्ट्वा दृष्ट्वा मनोभवः <ls>H. 2. 111</ls>; अक्षितारासु विव्याध द्विषतः स तनुत्रिणः <ls>Śi. 19. 99</ls>; विद्धमात्रः <ls>R. 5. 51</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 60</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 70</ls>; <ls>Bk. 5. 52</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">9. 66</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 69</ls>. {@--2@} To bore, perforate, pierce through. {@--3@} To pick. {@--4@} To wave or brandish in triumph (as the tail &c.).
